Text: Many thanks for this.  I have been looking for ages.  I was searching for "Muppet" without the S and nothing turned up for DVDR.  But how did this 16:9 transfer end up being non-anamorphic?
why did you strip the spanish subtitles and audio?
How do you expand all the individual archives? i keep getting errors on lots of the .rar files... i'm using stuffit expander (mac)

DeathBack you suck!
You say that the dvd contains the languages english, portuguese and spanish.
BUT THERE IS NO SPANISH AUDIO!!!!
why would you strip the spanish audio away?!
no reason to do that and then still say that the spanish language is available!!!!
